# =============================================================================
# UVR Headless Runner - GPU Extra Requirements
# =============================================================================
# AUTO-GENERATED - Contains GPU-specific packages with SHA256 hashes.
#
# SECURITY: These packages replace their CPU equivalents for GPU acceleration.
# Hashes ensure package integrity - if tampered, pip will refuse to install.
#
# NOTE: onnxruntime-gpu replaces onnxruntime (CPU) from the main requirements.
# =============================================================================

# GPU ONNX Runtime - replaces onnxruntime==1.16.3 from main requirements
# Upgraded from 1.16.3 to 1.19.2 for CUDA 12.x compatibility
# (1.16.3 only supports CUDA 11.x, causing CUDAExecutionProvider init failure)
# Hashes fetched from PyPI for Linux x86_64 cp39
onnxruntime-gpu==1.19.2 \
    --hash=sha256:c9e369f01f55ea726ae5d28f18236426e52e97c433f0b7682054e61c478a06c9
